hero.title: VuetifyTemplate
hero.description:
A simple Vuetify Template with structure and preinstalled plugins
This isn't a Style Template, only a Code Template!

plugins.title: vue-router
plugins.subtitle: Route between different Views
plugins.text:
Example Views: Home and About
router is configured in /plugins/router.js

plugins.title: vuex
plugins.subtitle: The Vuex Store is storing application states
plugins.text:
Implemented in the Side Drawer.
The Config files are Store.js and Vuex.js

plugins.title: Themes
plugins.subtitle: A customizable light and dark theme
plugins.text:
There is a Theme-Switch implemented in the App-Bar.
Themes are configured in the vuetify.js

plugins.title: vue-i18n
plugins.subtitle: Internationalization plugin
plugins.text: The whole project is internationalized. Language Files are stored in /locales. The config File is i18n.js.

steps.title: Use the GitHub-Repository as a Template
steps.text: Click below, to get to the Git-Repository. After that, click on the green template button at the top right to setup your own Repository based on the VuetifyTemplate.

steps.title: Join the Vuetify Discord
steps.text: Get help immediately from the development team and other community members in the official Discord server and get access to private support channels.

steps.title: Bugs or suggestions for VuetifyTemplate
steps.text: If you have any suggestions, improvements or you found bugs. Just go to the Git-Repository and create a ticket.
